raw_results.original: Nothing is perfect . Even our bodies , the result of billions of years of evolution from the simplest single - celled life forms , begin to fail after awhile . All of the things that make our body run , our stomachs , hearts , brains , kidneys , will eventually stop working . But the main thing that causes people to age is their own DNA .
